original_title: American Fame Pt. 2: Forgetting Jonathan Brandis
overview: Cam Archer revisits the life of child actor Jonathan Brandis who committed suicide in 2003. Lydia Lunch narrates this meditation on fame, the actorâ€™s pressure to remain in the public eye and the surreal events in the lead up to his unexplained death.
title: American Fame Pt. 2: Forgetting Jonathan Brandis
